General.Name: Muramoto Electron (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Muramoto Electron (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells metal and plastic parts for audio/visual equipment; and electronic equipment for automobiles and office automation appliances in Thailand, Japan, the United States, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Electric Parts for Automotive Business, Electronic Parts for Office Automation Business, and Other Business. The company offers car related products, such as display audio units, audio panels, CD and DVD changers, gear units, air bag parts, keyless entry transmitters and receivers, corner sensors, press and window regulator parts, mounting boards for keyless entry receivers, print circuit board assemblies for CD changers, and mounting boards for cameras. It also manufactures video cameras and single-lens reflex camera products for consumers, including video camera LCD units, back cover and lens units for single lens reflex cameras, and top cover units for mirrorless cameras; and printer finished products and electronic parts, such as printer finished products, thermal fuses, hermetic terminals, and magnetron filter box parts for use in industrial applications. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Muramoto Electron (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Muramoto Industry Co., Ltd.
